020package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api;
021
022import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.AbstractAutomaticBean;
023
024/**
025 * A Java Bean that implements the component lifecycle interfaces by
026 * calling the bean's setters for all configuration attributes.
027 *
028 * @noinspection AbstractClassNeverImplemented
029 * @noinspectionreason All files now use {@code AbstractAutomaticBean}.
030 *     We will remove this class in #12873.
031 * @deprecated since 10.9.3. Use {@code AbstractAutomaticBean} instead.
032 */
033// -@cs[AbstractClassName] We can not break compatibility with previous versions.
034@Deprecated(since = "10.9.3")
035public abstract class AutomaticBean extends AbstractAutomaticBean {
036    /**
037     * Enum to specify behaviour regarding ignored modules.
038     */
039    public enum OutputStreamOptions {
040
041        /**
042         * Close stream in the end.
043         */
044        CLOSE,
045
046        /**
047         * Do nothing in the end.
048         */
049        NONE,
050
051    }
052}
